评论概述: My favorite for the Renaissance Faire
评论详情: This piece is so versatile. The fabric is very thin, but I tend to layer it anyway. The fit is true to size but also very stretchy to accommodate some up or down.
One sleeve was missing the top elastic entirely. It wasn't damaged, it just was not there. Even sizing down one size, the dress was so oversized I probably could've fit myself and a friend inside it.

Fabric is soft and breathable. Fabric is different from what I expected it to be. It is flaterring, though in my opinion, it’s not worth the price. Stretchy. the shoulder area, is a little awkward. This would look good for summer outfits, maternity shoots, and renaissance costume.

评论用户: DO NOT order from them.  Dress came in baby pink, was to be beige. No drawstring, no high low cut and the sleeves were just a few inches long.  Complete scam.
评论详情: Worst product description vs what was received.  Dress was to be beige came in baby pink. No drawstring no high low cut, it actually dragged the floor it was so long.  Was completely sheer and the sleeves were only a couple inches longAmazon should remove this vendor for scamming.
Not incredibly well made with a few strings here and there but overall it was a really nice dress

评论概述: So sheer and not worth the price
评论详情: This dress is not very good quality and so sheer its very see through. Not worth for the price.

评论概述: Great for both the Renaissance Festival and as a maternity dres!
评论详情: First of all, I love this dress. It's comfortable, it's flattering, I think it would work as equally well for larger chested women than it did for my one A and one B-C cup (let's be realistic, women with drastically differently sized boobs, not everything does hide that).  After paying way too much for a corset at a local shop, I realized that I probably needed a dress to go under it. After hemming and hawing about what to go with and spending way too much comparing dresses, I finally convinced myself that this was the one I would go with because I thought all of the example photos of pregnant women in their maternity outftis were adorable, even though I wasn't pregnant myself anyways.  Well, turns out I was when I ordered it, even if I didn't get that little surprise result on a stick for another week.  Anyway, I do love a bargain so while I appreciated the compliments I got on my outfit at a Ren faire I went to, I'm also looking forward to using it again in a few months for a maternity shoot. Thanks, vision-dress!
Very thin fabric and doesn't look like photo. Stretchy and true to size.
Beautiful color,  light fabric. Perfect for under my corsets for RenFaire
Flattering, comfortable, flowy. Sheer but it is meant to be an undergarment.
The fabric is amazing and the fit it’s great! Order one size down! And enjoy!

This dress was light and airy with a touch of elegance for a mountain wedding. Loved everything about it. It was not see through so no need to wear a slip. I have full busted and just made me comfortable to be the mother of the groom and still feel fashionable. Great buy!
The material was very thin and see through and the slit was very open. I ordered a medium and it was very big on me. I will be returning this item.
thought this dress would be cuter, but it puffs out weirdly in the chest - kind of frumpy.

评论概述: Not at all as expected. Not true to size.
评论详情: I ordered a medium because I'm pregnant but I obviously should have ordered an xxs! They used way too much damn fabric on this dress. It looks like I'm wearing a freaking fitted sheet for a long size bed. Iliterally look like Ariel when she washes up on the beach and has to wear a freaking boat sail. I'm so so sad because now I don't have time to reorder another dress for my gender reveal.

Love this dress I ordered the color black and it's so pretty and flattering on the only things to know are that the slit does go all the way up but that's easily fixed by a safety pin and like other reviews I sized two sizes down and it fit perfectly :))) for reference I usually wear a XL and I ordered a M  Edit: I reordered this dress in blue and it arrived without the elastic around the waist and a snag in the fabric, so I had to request a replacement. In addition, it seems like the blue dress is a different material than the black as well where the blue fabric feels a bit more plasticky and the black fabric was very light and soft.
The dress is cute but mine came with stains and no tag unfortunately so it must’ve been used
Got it in white... Extremely sheer and felt paper thin. Also one of the most unflattering articles of clothing I've encountered. I will say, it does look nice with a corset on top, but not worth $50
Loved it for my maturity shoot! Be careful when you wash it! Do it by its self!! Bleeds really bad!

评论概述: Not 60% cotton, completely misleading in quality.
评论详情: I bought this because it said it had cotton in the fabric.  When I received my dress, I immediately noticed the plasic-like texture.  And of course, the tag says 100% polyester.  Had my hopes up for nothing but a cheap costume.
Perfect for my dark elf costume for Halloween. Would definitely wear normally. Comfortable and stretchy.
My wife loved the dress!
This dress was awesome. It fit well, and it was super easy to Iron. It came wrinkly as expected, but it ironed out very nicely, and the material was durable. Recommend!

I got this dress to wear to the Renaissance Festival, and specifically chose this one because it ties on the front, and I needed access for breastfeeding. I ended up tying it a different way, which covered the nursing bra really well!  Beware, it has a really high opening in the front of the skirt part that can be revealing in the wind. I wore spandex shorts underneath, and was totally fine.  I should have steamed it to get the wrinkles out, but ran out of time.  Overall, very pleased! And it's such a pretty color green!

Very comfy and soft and stretchy in all the right places. I’m not a fan of the slit in the skirt part. It’s right in the middle which is awkward if you wore it alone. However, it works great for my Ren Faire outfit since I put a skirt over the top of it. It is not sheer so the material is good quality. I bought a peasant top from this brand and I love it.
Used this for a maternity photo shoot and it was amazing. It fit perfectly!

评论概述: Pretty dresss & a review on 2 colors with sizing info.
评论详情: Pretty dress, I've now ordered it in the off white and the light blue colors for Halloween costumes. It's diversity will give me the option to wear each of them with a bustier for steam punk or rennisance or a cowgirl with varsiois colors of busters, cowboy boots, hats and accessories I have.  I will say that the off white is a tad see thru and I will definitely need to wear at minimum nipple covers and perhaps nude boy shorts or spanx while the blue is a bit thicker and does not seem as transparent.  For sizing I do wish they had an extra small as it is a lot of fabric even in the small particularly on the top. For reference I am 5 ft 8 inches tall, 140-145lbs with a 32D bra size and wear between a 26/27 in jeans, a 4/6 in dresses but typically need to go up to a medium and sometimes large in shirts because of my chest size. The top is more than generous for larger chested women. The bottom is flowy but not overly so that I feel there is too much fabric. I do have a booty to fill it out though.

评论概述: See through. Weird fit in the chest.

The chest area also has lots of extra fabric and it’s hard to get it to lay right in a way that looks flattering in my opinion.
I ordered these for my engagement photos and my goodness it was phenomenal. Very comfortable and looks just like the picture
The fit is perfect and is a great base for ren faire can be paired with a lot.

Wore for my maternity shoot. It was perfection!

I got this dress to wear in my maternity photos but it was a little baggy and very wrinkly. If I had spent an hour steaming I might have been able to get the wrinkles out but I ended up finding something I liked more.

I returned this product over three weeks ago because it was terrible quality and didn’t fit. ai still have not received my refund and have constructed customer service several times and even a phone call and the lady was rude to me and told me I need to wait another 30 days for my refund onto my Amazon account balance. Purchased for a photo shoot loved the look. I steamed it when I got it to get all the wrinkles out from the bottom portion. Looked great. I only disliked all the room I had in back of dress (bra area) I just tucked it in so it wasn’t hanging out so much
The dress is cute! I’m usually a small so I stuck to my size. The cut in the skirt is a little awkward. And the arms are tight. Will be returning it’s not usable for long wear
I did my maternity photoshoot in this dress and it was perfect! Very stretchy and comfortable. Definitely would recommend buying this dress for a maternity photoshoot!
It is better than described. Wonderful material and perfect fit.
Super soft material and perfect for my pictures. I had gotten an XL but it was too big so I swapped it out to an L. 5’9 & 240 lbs

As show in pictures, may need another skirt under

What a great dress. It’s lightweight, sheer and stretchy. My only complaint was that it’s bust area is very loose especially if your on the smaller side. Maybe I should have went a size down.  I also have larger arms and it for nicely. Just but the dress.
I wore this dress to a Renaissance fair, and it was very comfortable! I didn’t find it to be sheer and thought the material was very breathable. Would buy again.

Perfect for an elf look!!  I’m five foot one and around 115 lbs. The dress was long enough for a glowing look but, short enough that I wouldn’t be stepping on it.
I got this dress for my Halloween costume and it was perfect! A little on the sheer side and the arm holes were a bit tight but in all worth the price!

I really liked this dress. However, I didn’t notice that it was polyester, which I recently choose not to wear due to its unhealthy quality. (Research it on your own if you are curious about that.)  But as for the dress itself, the quality is very nice and it’s super cute. It fits pretty loose and large as expected, but it still felt pretty flattering to me.

I bought this for the Renaissance festival and it was beautiful and fit perfectly, no wardrobe malfunction, wore without a bra and you could not see anything through it, I liked the material and was very flattering. I am definitely going to wear it for dates/special occasion etc. You won’t be disappointed. I’m 5’5”, 210. Size chart is very accurate! Absolutely love this dress and received many compliments on it.

评论概述: Stretch on elastic is too tight, but the fabric is SO LOOSE.
评论详情: There is way too much fabric for proportions compared to how tight the elastic is. I would order a size down but the elastic will be too tight. I am a B/C cup, ordered a size large because my waist is 31 inches. I'm 5'3. Kind of pare shaped. But..... the size large would easily fit a DD with room to spare... if you have a tiny waist. My complaint is for them to just use more elastic so it doesn't fit so tightly when sized down.

I used this product when I went to a local ren fair recently and was a bit apprehensive when I got it. I am a very small woman so length was my biggest fear, however I didn't need to worry at all! It fit really well, wasn't extremely sheer, and was super comfy. The only reason I'm not giving it five stars is because cleaning it is a bit difficult. There aren't really any instructions so I've just been hand washing it because I don't want to damage it in any way. Overall, really great dress especially for petite women!

评论概述: Cute but wear a skirt on top or under
评论详情: This is a very comfy and light dress. The only issue is that the skirt opens up to the waist. Very breezy. I wore a skirt over it so it wasn't terrible for me. Just keep that in mind. :-)

This dress was really pretty and the material was great; but it was way too big even at 8months pregnant weighing 200lbs. I got a large and I was swimming in it. Couldn’t even wear it for my maternity pics. I would size down two sizes; I promise the elastic will comfortably stretch but the rest will not be overly baggy to the point of not being able to see your body

Super feminine dress- while the fabric is somewhat sheer, it's lovely and nothing that a slip won't fix if you mind it. Let's talk size, I purchased the XL to have the maximum flow for the skirt, as part of a costume, that being said I adjusted the top and the length of the sleeves- it runs pretty big.  I sew and tbh I like buying big on amazon because I can tailor everything just the way I want it. The dress was a total success, and even though I bought it for a costume, I will be wearing it on a regular basis.
Very thin material so thin you can see right tho it

Nice flowy fabric
I am 5'4 and 157 and a medium is almost to big on me but I'm gonna make it work. Super cute though

I’m 5’2” & 160lbs, I ordered a small & it was still huge on me. Had to pair it with a belt to make it work. I did have some doubts because of other purchases I’ve made similar to this one but I absolutely love it! It fits just right and the fabric is so light and it goes well with about anything! Would definitely buy again.

It’s so fun and flowy! i wore it for my engagement photos. it’s super stretchy too

I wear this as a chemise at a Renaissance festival that runs from May into June, and the lightweight fabric and off-the-shoulder style keeps me a little cooler. The material is synthetic, but it is also durable.
A little sheer but only in the sunlight. Over all  flattering, comfortable and perfect for my maternity shoot. I am normally around 165 and currently pregnant at 195 and a large fit perfect.

Bought this dress for my maternity photos and I absolutely love how it turned out! It was extremely wrinkly in the package but this was easy to fix with a steamer. It’s flowy and so flattering  I got an XL to account for my belly and it fit very comfortably.

Love love love this Anna kaci brand! I have bought many dresses from them and the quality is good! A bit pricey sometimes but overall lovely. The white is sheer so just but a nude/flesh toned Skims slip and you’ll be fine.
Originally got this for my pregnancy photoshoot. Ended up not wearing it for that event but wore it after my pregnancy and it’s so cute!!

Español: Hermoso traje, excelente calidad. Deseaba algo boho y comodo para las fotos de maternidad. Soy una mujer "curvy" en mis 7 meses de embarazo y lo pedí Large. Fue perfecto.  Beautiful dress, excellent quality. I wanted something boho and comfortable for my maternity photos. I am a "curvy" woman in my 7 months of pregnancy and I ordered it Large. It was perfect.
I wore this dress under another one and it was so comfortable and nice. I also wanted one more item for my fairy look and I think this made it pop a bit more!

Loved this dress for maternity photos. After debating on size I went with a small - 36 weeks pregnant (5’5”, 170lbs). It’s great for photos. I would agree with a lot of reviews and say sizing runs big - pregnant I’m usually a medium.

Not cute unless you are wearing for maternity purposes or plan to cinch it with a period appropriate corset. Returned.

评论概述: Super flowy. Perfect for layering or as is styling
评论详情: Normally wear a medium. Purchased a small. Glad I did.

This dress was fantastic for my maternity shoot at 39 weeks pregnant! It's beautiful materiel and very flatering. It also dries fast after getting wet. My only warning is about the slit in the front. The beach was stormy the day we had our photos done so the wind was pretty violent. I wore a slip and an undershirt but it was hard not to let the slip show during the shoot since the slit of this dress goes up so high. Just something to keep in mind. I was fighting to keep the dress from blowing completely open the whole time. Other than that it's very comfortable and elegant. 10 of 10 would definitely recommend getting this. Sizing: I bought a small. For reference I'm 5'4" and I weigh 149 right now. Pre pregnancy I was usually 120-125.
Not what I expected. It's completely see-through
This looks like how I expected, but the white is literally transparent. I had to pair it with spandex shorts and a tank top so the world didn’t see everything.
So cute and flattering! Very comfortable And breathable!
Used this dress for our maternity photos, and it is absolutely stunning!

This dress is completely see through, even if you bought a bra to go under you’d be able to see it. Also I don’t understand why the slit goes all the way up to get in the middle. It should be on the side. You’d be better off wearing nothing because this dress will expose everything. I’m glad I bought a backup from a different brand!

Works for what I need it for but I wish it was less sheer . Price could be a bit cheaper for the quality but  it’s flattering with the off the shoulder and tie front. Waist band is pretty loose , consider sizing down maybe !!

I have purchased this dress in 3 different colors (blue, red, white) from this company. I love it! My only complaint is that the elastic band is not sturdy on any of the dresses. It’s not that the dress is tight at all; it’s actually a perfect and relaxed fit. It’s just that the elastic is flimsy. For example, My dog jumped on me and the blue dress fell apart and turned into a “tent” immediately and irreparably. Thankfully, I was home and I changed into the other dress, the red one, from this company. Well, that dress snagged on something as I was sitting down, so when I went to stand up…the dress was being tugged on and immediately fell apart. So, with my 3rd dress (the white one) from them, I am so so careful…I don’t even hug people out of fear that the dress will get snagged on their jewelry (or something). I don’t want to be embarrassed like that again lol
Absolutely beautiful and can fit a tan she of sizes since it’s stretchy ! Love!
a little on the sheer side but sooooo comfy i would absolutely get another in black if they had em!  for reference I am 5'2, 140lbs
Beautiful dress! I used for maternity pics and will be able to use after pregnancy as well.
Both the color I was expecting, more white than cream. Fully see through, and the sleeves only go to my elbows

The only issue I had is that the threads attaching the sleeves to the dress are very fragile, they snapped when I gently tried the dress on the first time I ordered it and I had to exchange for a new one.

I'm a size 20 pregnancy, going to wear this for maternity pictures and then to renaissance festivals! The dress goes on first like a tube, then you slip the arms on, for anyone confused about the actual function. I ordered the XL and was 280 here, 5'4.
Good quality and comfy with stretch. Perfect for the party!!

Ordered this dress for our maternity photos and it came out amazing! I’m normally a 16/18 and the large fit with room to spare even though I’m 8 months pregnant. A little sheer so I wore a slip underneath.
